generations.content_context: Development has shifted towards core performance optimizations, including a major refactor of the message service and infrastructure migration to the Jeju network. generations.scene_or_viz_prompt: Eliza stands with outstretched hand, passing a glowing digital token to an unseen teammate—spotlight slicing through winter darkness, blue shadows sweeping across her determined face, as swirling data streams arc diagonally behind her in dramatic, frozen collaboration.
generations.full_prompt:
Create an illustration for a tech news magazine.

CHARACTERS (use reference sheet for exact appearance):
- ELIZA: Eliza is a stylized 3D anime-like young woman with a confident, playful, slightly teasing vibe, often posing with expressive hand gestures as if presenting, reacting, or joking.

SCENE: Eliza stands with outstretched hand, passing a glowing digital token to an unseen teammate—spotlight slicing through winter darkness, blue shadows sweeping across her determined face, as swirling data streams arc diagonally behind her in dramatic, frozen collaboration.

ART STYLE: Conceptual New Yorker/Monocle style with bold shapes and visual metaphors. Hand-crafted feel with visible brushstrokes.

REQUIREMENTS:
- Characters must match reference sheet EXACTLY (colors, costume, features)
- Dynamic composition suitable for editorial use
- Professional quality illustration
- No text or watermarks
- Scene should feel natural and engaging
